mapper.select: SELECT r.replyno, r.content, r.categoryno, r.boardno, r.regdate FROM reply r join memberdb m WHERE r.memberno=m.memberno and m.memberno=#{memberno} order by m.regdate DESC
SELECT l.boardno, l.title, l.memberno , l.countno, l.regdate FROM boardfree l join memberdb m WHERE l.memberno=m.memberno and m.memberno=#{memberno} and l.active=0 order by regdate desc
SELECT l.boardno, l.title, l.memberno, l.countno ,l.regdate FROM boardlaw l join memberdb m WHERE l.memberno=m.memberno and m.memberno=#{memberno} and l.active=0 order by regdate desc

SELECT c.cheatname, l.goodskind, l.domain, l.stateno, l.deposit, l.goodsname,l.cheatername , l.bankname, l.account, l.depositdate, l.phone, l.regdate FROM memberdb m join cheaterdb l join cheat c WHERE l.memberno=#{memberno} and m.memberno=1 and l.cheatno = c.cheatno order by regdate desc
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERDB SET ACTIVE = 1 WHERE MEMBERNO = #{MEMBERNO}
